text: Ezhamedam is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jayadevan, starring M. G. Soman and Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Prathapachandran * Janardanan * M. G. Soman ==References== Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ezhamedam
